text: Ihudi o khristanara bale, amara allahara santana o tamra priyajana. Apani baluna, tabe tini tomaderake papera binimaye kena sasti dana karabena? Baram tomara'o an'yan'ya srsta manabera antarbhukta sadharana manusa. Tini yake iccha ksama karena ebam yake iccha sasti pradana karena. Nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhye ya kichu ache, tate allahara'i adhipatya rayeche ebam tamra dike'i pratyabartana karate habe.
